body:
Amazon Repricing Feedback Survey

Hey fellow seller, thanks for lending your brain for a few minutes. We are studying how repricing actually feels for indie and full-time book folks. Expect dry humor, zero robo-sales vibes, and a better repricer at the end of the rainbow.

Shelf Life & Seller Lore

What sourcing moves fill your cart (pick all that feel true)?

Daily Rituals & Tooling

Which signals most influence your repricing calls?

Risk, Glitches & Experiments
